content.question: Which of the following relationships must be true?

choices.label: <math alttext="vector p sub e equals vector p sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mover accent="true"><mi>p</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mi>e</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mover accent="true"><mi>p</mi><mo>→</mo></mover><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
